item.title: mount partition linux
item.description: First setup the device correctly, for eg:, using gparted To mount a device /dev/sdb1, use a command like this mount -t auto /dev/sdb1 /data to dismount, umount /dev/sdb1 To mount on boot in Ubuntu 16, edit /etc/fstab and add a line like this UUID=xxx /data ext4 defaults 0 1 The UUID defines the device to be mounted, it can be found by using: sudo blkid
